snippet.title: Neverdark - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#Neverdark is a pausable real-time strategy game which brings you to a post-apocalyptic world. Following a global blackout, society has collapsed and it will be your goal to rebuild it.

Check out the product page: http://www.slitherine.com/neverdark

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1036430/Neverdark/

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeverdarkGame/


Slitherine:

Slitherine Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slitherine/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SlitherineGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slitherinegrou
